name: Starbucks Coffee Company
goal: Starbucks is a global coffee company that imports, roasts and serves coffee, food and other beverages to customers in over 3000 stores across the EMEA region.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: We are particularly interested in policies on competition, health, sustainability and environmental protection.
